  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class Battleships_View
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    This is the View Class that will display the GUI for the Game It extends the JFrame

    Abdassami Alvi

      • Battleships_View

        public Battleships_View(PlayerMap pm,
                CPUMap cm,
                PlayerMap pm2)
        This is the View constructor of class Battleships_View It takes in the parameters of the PlayerMap and CPUMap classes
        Parameters:
        pm - is the player 1 grid of a PlayerMap
        cm - is the AI grid of a CPUMap
        pm2 - is the player 2 grid of a PlayerMap
